keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stephen Gethins opposes Brexit and Boris Johnson's government.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give Scotland a choice on its future
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocates for Scotland's right to decide its own future.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect jobs and opportunities for young people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Focus on creating job opportunities for youth.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Challenge the UK Government to invest in our NHS and public services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pushes the UK Government for more investment in NHS and public services.
Aims to end austerity imposed by Westminster.

issues.health: Guaranteeing the rights of EU citizens living in North East Fife
issues.labourEmployment: Protect jobs and opportunities for young people
issues.transport: Backing the reinstatement of the Levenmouth rail link
issues.socialWelfare: Better housing for armed services families

community.content: Protecting local economy, supporting schools and universities, promoting tourism and food & drink industry

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for North East Fife
politicalExperience.achievements: Handled more than 20,000 cases for people across North East Fife on a range of issues including housing, benefits, and Brexit impact.

endorsements.endorsement: Stephen fights tirelessly for North East Fife and has brought people together across the political divide to oppose Brexit and Boris Johnson's government.
Stephen is a strong advocate for the environment and locally in NE Fife. He has called for the UK Government to step up on the climate emergency and I will be supporting him at this General Election.
Campaign group swaps support to SNP's Gethins.

quotes.text: Campaign group swaps support to SNP's Gethins.

examples: Handled more than 20,000 cases for people across North East Fife.
Stephen fights tirelessly for North East Fife and has brought people together across the political divide.
Protecting the local economy, supporting our schools and universities.
Backing the reinstatement of the Levenmouth rail link.
Working locally to protect leisure centre opening hours in Cupar and St Andrews.
Challenge the UK Government to invest in our NHS and public services.

nonPolicyAttributes.education: Worked in the EU and USSR on peace-building efforts.
nonPolicyAttributes.family: Lives in North East Fife with his wife and two young children.

examples: Lives in North East Fife with his wife and two young children.
